title: [Merelle's Magic Shoppe]
[Merelle's Outfitting]
[Merelle's General Store]
description: Enclosed by white brocade walls, the shop features a large potted fern in the center of its cherrywood floor.  A gold and crimson wyvern tapestry hangs under the beam ceiling.  Right near the front is a carved oak table and a large cherrywood cabinet.
